title: Smart Data Models - GovHydro2
description: Adapted from CIM data models. IEEE hydro turbine governor model represents plants with straightforward penstock configurations and hydraulic-dashpot governors.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovHydro2

aturb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine numerator multiplier (Aturb).  Typical Value = -1. Default: 0.0

bturb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine denominator multiplier (Bturb).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

db1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Intentional deadband width (db1).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

db2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Unintentional deadband (db2).  Unit = MW.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

eps.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Intentional db hysteresis (eps).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

gv1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 1, PU gv (Gv1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

gv2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 2, PU gv (Gv2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

gv3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 3, PU gv (Gv3).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

gv4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 4, PU gv (Gv4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

gv5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 5, PU gv (Gv5).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

gv6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 6, PU gv (Gv6).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kturb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine gain (Kturb).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

mwbase.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Base for power values (MWbase) (> 0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

pgv1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 1, PU power (Pgv1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

pgv2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 2, PU power (Pgv2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

pgv3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 3, PU power (Pgv3).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

pgv4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 4, PU power (Pgv4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

pgv5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 5, PU power (Pgv5).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

pgv6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 6, PU power (Pgv6).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

pmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum gate opening (Pmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

pmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum gate opening; ().  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

rperm.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Permanent droop (Rperm).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

rtemp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Temporary droop (Rtemp).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

tg.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gate servo time constant (Tg).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

tp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pilot servo valve time constant (Tp).  Typical Value = 0.03. Default: 0

tr.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Dashpot time constant (Tr).  Typical Value = 12. Default: 0

tw.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Water inertia time constant (Tw).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0

uc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum gate closing velocity (Uc) (<0).  Unit = PU/sec.   Typical Value = -0.1. Default: 0.0

uo.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum gate opening velocity (Uo).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0
